{{infobox College swim team| | university = [[University of Virginia]] | image = | hex1 = #0D3268 | hex2 = #FF7003 | founded = Men's: 1925
Women's: 1974 | conference = [[Atlantic Coast Conference]] | conferenceshort = ACC | nickname = Cavs, Wahoos | history = | home pool = UVA Aquatic and Fitness Center | city = Charlottesville | state = Virginia | stateabb = VA | color1 = Orange | color2 = Navy Blue | coach = [[Mark Bernardino]] | men's ncaa = 0 | women's ncaa = 0 | men's conference = 14 | women's conference = 9 }} The '''[[Virginia Cavaliers]] swimming and diving''' teams represent the University of Virginia in all National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I Swimming and Diving Events. == History == Swimming and diving was introduced at the University of Virginia in 1925, when it was only a men's only sport. It was introduced as a women's sport in 1974. Recently, both the men's and women's teams have been dominant in ACC play, each winning the past four championships. == Roster == === Men's === === Women's === {| border="2" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="text-align:center; margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- !style="background:#C2DDFF" width=170px |Player !style="background:#C2DDFF" width=100px |Event !style="background:#C2DDFF" width=70px |Height !style="background:#C2DDFF" width=30px |Class |- |align=left| {{flagicon|USA}} Shaun Casey || Fly/IM || — || Fr. |- |align=left| {{flagicon|USA}} Meredith Cavalier || Free/Back || 5-8 || Jr. |- |align=left| {{flagicon|AUS}} Charlotte Clarke || Back || 5-4 || So. |- |align=left| {{flagicon|USA}} Emily Dicus || Free/Back/Fly || — || Fr. |- |align=left| {{flagicon|USA}} Riley Flanagan || Free/Back/IM || 5-6 || So. |- |align=left| {{flagicon|USA}} Kelly Flynn || Breast/Free || 5-10 || Sr. |- |align=left| {{flagicon|USA}} Megan Fox || Breast/IM/Free || — || RFr. |- |align=left| {{flagicon|USA}} Laura Gartrell || Diving || — || Fr. |- |align=left| {{flagicon|USA}} Kelly Grant || Free || 5-10 || Jr. |- |align=left| {{flagicon|USA}} Alison Haulsee || Free/Fly || — || Fr. |- |align=left| {{flagicon|USA}} Meg Hutchinson || Back/Free || 5-6 || Jr. |} == Honors == * '''Men's ACC Swimming and Diving Championships (14)''' ::1987, 1990, 1999, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011 * '''Women's ACC Swimming and Diving Championships (9)''' ::1990, 1998, 1999, 2003, 2004, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011 == See also == *[[NCAA Men's Swimming and Diving Championships]] *[[NCAA Women's Swimming and Diving Championships]] == External Links == *[http://www.virginiasports.com/SportSelect.dbml?SPID=10592&DB_OEM_ID=17800 Virginia Cavaliers Swim & Dive] [[Category:Virginia Cavaliers]] [[Category:College swim teams in the United States]]
